name: SASUKE Challenger
description:
iOS4/iPhone4 Version(v1.03) released!!
The campaign starts!

“SASUKE Challenger” has been produced under “Monster 9 Co., Ltd.”, a production company of TBS responsible for the “SASUKE” television series.
Following international release, the application has already ranked in Japan’s App Store’s top 50 while achieving 1st place rank in the Game>Sports category..

This application is exclusive to the iPhone/iPod touch and was developed following the concept of “experience SASUKE”.
It is a 100% original development and not the result of grafting from consumer applications.

* Use of the iPhone linear sensor provides a sense of unity with the character
* Highly realistic through full 3D
* Camera work is linked to each movement of the character

Furthermore, simultaneous global implementation of Network Ranking is planned for release.

Make the most of the SASUKE experience through the simple operation of characters at their physical peak.

*7/4-7/18 iPhone4 campaign.
